text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Thanks for the pizza tip, a-hole!
Herman Cain is dead, hasted positive for COVID-19 less than two weeks after attending your Tulsa campaign rally, where he tweeted a photo of himself without a mask.
#TrumpKillsUs. 
#WearAMask
